definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: , bag-pipe, or < double pipe or Pan’s pipe (v. GFM:JBL, 1905, 166 ff.) (NH Levy:NHWB iii. 492; NH Aram. [[סִימְלאספּוֹן]] is tube, esp. vein, artery Id:ib. 513; loan-word fr. (late) Gk. sumfwni/a, Krauss:ii. 376, 390 Bev:41 Dr:Da 3:5 Nes:MM 37 (hence also later Lat. symphonia, Ital. zampogna), Prince:KB 9230);—abs. ´[[ס]]: Da 3:5, Da 3:15, = [[סיפניה]] Kt, [[סוּפּׂנְיָה]] Qr v:Da 3:10 (Syr. s.puwnyo0 id.; cf. Palm. [[ספון]] = su/mfwnov, in agreement, Lzb:330 GACooke:Inscr. 338).
